page.title: 02LYDEARD ST. LAWRENCE CHURCH.
page.content:
Lydeard St. Lawrence Church is quite small. When you walk through the door straight ahead of you is another door.
The church has four sets of pews and at the back of the church are two pews. Just in front of the two pews there is a font which is turned upside down because a {ROUND HEAD }was christened in it. He was on the government's side and the people of Lydeard St Lawrence were on the King's side.
At the front of the church there is a LADY CHAPEL which is dedicated to the Virgin{Mary.}Next to the Lady Chapel is the{CHANCEL where} there are three pews for the choir and the organ. { The{TOWER}is high. At the top there are gargoyles.
